plot_pot: <run_period name ="RunIII" cut ="( ( run_number >= 8317 && run_number <= 13696) || (run_number >= 13697 && run_number <= 14116) || (run_number >= 14117 && run_number <= 18960))" fraction = "1.0" />
bdtfile:
a
!(mctruth_is_delta_radiative && mctruth_cc_or_nc==1) !(mctruth_cc_or_nc==1 && mctruth_num_exiting_pi0==1) !(mctruth_cc_or_nc==0 && mctruth_nu_pdg == 14 && mctruth_num_exiting_pi0==1) !(mctruth_cc_or_nc==0 && fabs(mctruth_nu_pdg)==12)
(MCFlux_NuPosX > (0.0-1.55) && MCFlux_NuPosX < (256.35-1.55) && MCFlux_NuPosY > (-116.5+0.97) && MCFlux_NuPosY < (116.5+0.97) && MCFlux_NuPosZ > 0.0+0.1 && MCFlux_NuPosZ < 1036.8+0.1)
